author: Leticia
title: Leticia
text: I purchased BBG 1.0, 2.0, and the HELP diet guides for 80% off! Awesome deal!!! I immediately received the downloads and had no issues. Thanks for offering these at a great savings!!! ***Side note, my bank debit/credit card kept being "denied" even though it had the funds in it, but when I tried my credit card, it went right through.***
